amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow grant funds for apprenticeships to be used for apprenticeship programs registered with the U.S. Department of Labor (DOL) as well as industry-recognized apprenticeship programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to allow grant funds for apprenticeships to be used for apprenticeship programs registered with the U.S. Department of Labor (DOL) as well as industry-recognized apprenticeship programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hill (AR) amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 266 (Roll no. 285).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hill (AR) amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 266 (Roll no. 285).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Hill (AR).
